# -*- ck2.events -*-
# Audax Validator EnableCommentMetadata

# Written by zijistark via trait-notify.pl v1.02 on Mon Jul 11 21:26:53 2016 (Pacific)

#########################################
#       TRAIT NOTIFICATION EVENTS       #
#########################################

namespace = emf_notify

# NOTE: One should never call these event IDs directly but instead should use
# the named scripted effects in emf_notify_effects.txt to deliver notifications
# for the add/remove of traits. That way, when traits are added or changed,
# their trait IDs and thus event IDs here may change, but their named effects
# will always resolve to the correct event. Additionally, the scripted effects
# actually add/remove the trait as well so as to be able to avoid redundant
# notifications and catch coding errors.


##################################################
#    Trait Gain Notification Forwarder Events    #
# emf_notify.1 through emf_notify.1000 reserved  #
##################################################

# emf_notify.1 -- added amateurish_plotter (Amateurish Plotter)
# Audax Validator "." Ignore_1005
character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.1

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hide_window = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			ai = no
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			FROM = { ai = no }
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			FROMFROM = { ai = no }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no }
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		# If the target emf_notify_receiver is defined (and player), send notifications about ROOT's trait gain to them.
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no } }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.2001 } }
		}
		# If ROOT is a player, notify them.
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = no
				NOT = { character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver } # De-duplicate
			}
			character_event = { id = emf_notify.2001 }
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROM = { # If FROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2001 }
			}
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROMFROM = { # If FROMFROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
						character = ROOT_FROM
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2001 }
			}
		}
	}
}

# emf_notify.2 -- added flamboyant_schemer (Flamboyant Schemer)
# Audax Validator "." Ignore_1005
character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.2

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hide_window = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			ai = no
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			FROM = { ai = no }
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			FROMFROM = { ai = no }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no }
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		# If the target emf_notify_receiver is defined (and player), send notifications about ROOT's trait gain to them.
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no } }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.2002 } }
		}
		# If ROOT is a player, notify them.
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = no
				NOT = { character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver } # De-duplicate
			}
			character_event = { id = emf_notify.2002 }
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROM = { # If FROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2002 }
			}
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROMFROM = { # If FROMFROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
						character = ROOT_FROM
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2002 }
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

			limit = {
				ai = no
				NOT = { character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver } # De-duplicate
			}
			character_event = { id = emf_notify.2051 }

			if = {

					}

character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.64

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hide_window = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			ai = no
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			FROM = { ai = no }
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			FROMFROM = { ai = no }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no }
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		# If the target emf_notify_receiver is defined (and player), send notifications about ROOT's trait gain to them.
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no } }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.2064 } }
		}
		# If ROOT is a player, notify them.
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = no
				NOT = { character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver } # De-duplicate
			}
			character_event = { id = emf_notify.2064 }
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROM = { # If FROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2064 }
			}
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROMFROM = { # If FROMFROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
						character = ROOT_FROM
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2064 }
			}
		}
	}
}

		FROMFROM = { # If FROMFROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
						character = ROOT_FROM
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2076 }
			}
		}
	}

			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no }
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		# If the target emf_notify_receiver is defined (and player), send notifications about ROOT's trait gain to them.
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no } }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.2102 } }
		}
		# If ROOT is a player, notify them.
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = no
				NOT = { character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver } # De-duplicate
			}
			character_event = { id = emf_notify.2102 }
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROM = { # If FROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2102 }

						character = ROOT_FROM

						character = ROOT
						character = ROOT_FROM
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2114 }
			}
		}
	}

			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			FROMFROM = { ai = no }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no }
		}
	}

		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no } }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.2140 } }
		}
		# If ROOT is a player, notify them.
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = no
				NOT = { character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver } # De-duplicate
			}
			character_event = { id = emf_notify.2140 }

					}

		FROMFROM = { # If FROMFROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
						character = ROOT_FROM
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2152 }
			}
		}
	}
}

			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.2165 } }
		}
		# If ROOT is a player, notify them.
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = no
				NOT = { character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver } # De-duplicate
			}
			character_event = { id = emf_notify.2165 }
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROM = { # If FROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2165 }
			}
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT

					ai = no

			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.2203 } }
		}
		# If ROOT is a player, notify them.
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = no
				NOT = { character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver } # De-duplicate
			}
			character_event = { id = emf_notify.2203 }
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROM = { # If FROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2203 }
			}

# emf_notify.216 -- added melodious_voice (Melodious Voice)
# Audax Validator "." Ignore_1005
character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.216

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hide_window = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			ai = no
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			FROM = { ai = no }
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			FROMFROM = { ai = no }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no }
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		# If the target emf_notify_receiver is defined (and player), send notifications about ROOT's trait gain to them.
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no } }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.2216 } }
		}
		# If ROOT is a player, notify them.
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = no
				NOT = { character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver } # De-duplicate
			}
			character_event = { id = emf_notify.2216 }
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT

			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2216 }
			}
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT

				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver

						character = ROOT_FROM

				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2228 }
			}
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROMFROM = { # If FROMFROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
						character = ROOT_FROM
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2228 }
			}
		}

			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.2241 } }
		}
		# If ROOT is a player, notify them.
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = no
				NOT = { character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver } # De-duplicate
			}
			character_event = { id = emf_notify.2241 }
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROM = { # If FROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2241 }

# emf_notify.254 -- added doctores (Doctores)
# Audax Validator "." Ignore_1005
character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.254

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hide_window = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			ai = no
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			FROM = { ai = no }
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			FROMFROM = { ai = no }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no }
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		# If the target emf_notify_receiver is defined (and player), send notifications about ROOT's trait gain to them.
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no } }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.2254 } }
		}
		# If ROOT is a player, notify them.
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = no
				NOT = { character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver } # De-duplicate
			}
			character_event = { id = emf_notify.2254 }
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROM = { # If FROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2254 }
			}
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROMFROM = { # If FROMFROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
						character = ROOT_FROM
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2254 }
			}
		}

					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2266 }

			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no }
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		# If the target emf_notify_receiver is defined (and player), send notifications about ROOT's trait gain to them.
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no } }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.2279 } }
		}
		# If ROOT is a player, notify them.
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = no
				NOT = { character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver } # De-duplicate
			}
			character_event = { id = emf_notify.2279 }
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROM = { # If FROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2279 }
			}
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROMFROM = { # If FROMFROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
						character = ROOT_FROM
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.2279 }
			}
		}
	}
}

# emf_notify.1001 -- removed amateurish_plotter (Amateurish Plotter)

	id = emf_notify.1001

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hide_window = yes

		OR = {
			ai = no

		}
	}

		# If the target emf_notify_receiver is defined (and player), send notifications about ROOT's trait loss to them.
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no } }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.3001 } }
		}

				ai = no
				NOT = { character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver } # De-duplicate
			}
			character_event = { id = emf_notify.3001 }
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT

			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no

						character = ROOT
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.3001 }
			}
		}

						character = ROOT_FROM
					}
				}

		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROMFROM = { # If FROMFROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
						character = ROOT_FROM
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.3006 }
			}
		}
	}
}

				character_event = { id = emf_notify.3044 }
			}

		FROMFROM = { # If FROMFROM is a player, notify them.

					ai = no

			limit = { event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no } }

				NOT = { character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver } # De-duplicate
			}

			if = {

					}

				character_event = { id = emf_notify.3120 }

		FROMFROM = { # If FROMFROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
						character = ROOT_FROM
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.3145 }
			}
		}
	}
}

						character = ROOT

		}

			limit = { event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no } }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.3196 } }

			if = {

		FROMFROM = { # If FROMFROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
						character = ROOT_FROM
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.3208 }
			}
		}
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.1234

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hide_window = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			ai = no
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			FROM = { ai = no }
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			FROMFROM = { ai = no }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no }
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		# If the target emf_notify_receiver is defined (and player), send notifications about ROOT's trait loss to them.
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no } }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.3234 } }
		}
		# If ROOT is a player, notify them.
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = no
				NOT = { character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver } # De-duplicate
			}
			character_event = { id = emf_notify.3234 }
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROM = { # If FROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.3234 }
			}
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROMFROM = { # If FROMFROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
						character = ROOT_FROM
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.3234 }
			}
		}
	}
}

		# If the target emf_notify_receiver is defined (and player), send notifications about ROOT's trait loss to them.

			}
			character_event = { id = emf_notify.3259 }

			if = {

					}

						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
						character = ROOT_FROM
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.3271 }
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = no
				NOT = { character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver } # De-duplicate
			}
			character_event = { id = emf_notify.3284 }
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROM = { # If FROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.3284 }
			}
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROMFROM = { # If FROMFROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
						character = ROOT_FROM
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.3284 }
			}
		}
	}
}

# emf_notify.1285 -- removed paragon (Paragon)
# Audax Validator "." Ignore_1005
character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.1285

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hide_window = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			ai = no
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			FROM = { ai = no }
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			FROMFROM = { ai = no }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no }
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		# If the target emf_notify_receiver is defined (and player), send notifications about ROOT's trait loss to them.
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { ai = no } }
			event_target:emf_notify_receiver = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.3285 } }
		}
		# If ROOT is a player, notify them.
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = no
				NOT = { character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver } # De-duplicate
			}
			character_event = { id = emf_notify.3285 }
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROM = { # If FROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.3285 }
			}
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		FROMFROM = { # If FROMFROM is a player, notify them.
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOR = { # De-duplicate
						character = event_target:emf_notify_receiver
						character = ROOT
						character = ROOT_FROM
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = emf_notify.3285 }
			}
		}
	}
}


####################################################
#          Trait Gain Notification Events          #
# emf_notify.2001 through emf_notify.3000 reserved #
####################################################

# emf_notify.2001 -- added amateurish_plotter (Amateurish Plotter) to FROM [notification]
# Audax Validator "." Ignore_1005
character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.2001
	desc = emf_notify.2001.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2001.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2001.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			is_liege_of = FROM
			FROM = { is_councillor = yes }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2001.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			NOT = { character = FROM }
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

# Audax Validator "." Ignore_1005

	id = emf_notify.2022

	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2022.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			NOT = { character = FROM }
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

# Audax Validator "." Ignore_1005
character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.2047
	desc = emf_notify.2047.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2047.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2047.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			is_liege_of = FROM
			FROM = { is_councillor = yes }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2047.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			NOT = { character = FROM }
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

		trigger = {
			NOT = { character = FROM }
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2096.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2096.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			is_liege_of = FROM
			FROM = { is_councillor = yes }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2096.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			NOT = { character = FROM }
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

	id = emf_notify.2120

			NOT = { character = FROM }
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

	desc = emf_notify.2169.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2169.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2169.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			is_liege_of = FROM
			FROM = { is_councillor = yes }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2169.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			NOT = { character = FROM }
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

		trigger = {
			NOT = { character = FROM }
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

# emf_notify.2218 -- added calm_voice (Calm Voice) to FROM [notification]
# Audax Validator "." Ignore_1005
character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.2218
	desc = emf_notify.2218.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2218.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2218.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			is_liege_of = FROM
			FROM = { is_councillor = yes }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2218.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			NOT = { character = FROM }
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

			FROM = { is_councillor = yes }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2242.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			NOT = { character = FROM }
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

		text = emf_notify.3030.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3030.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			is_liege_of = FROM
			FROM = { is_councillor = yes }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3030.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			NOT = { character = FROM }
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }

		text = emf_notify.3079.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3079.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			is_liege_of = FROM
			FROM = { is_councillor = yes }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3079.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			NOT = { character = FROM }
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

	picture = GFX_evt_emissary

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3128.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3128.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			is_liege_of = FROM
			FROM = { is_councillor = yes }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3128.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			NOT = { character = FROM }
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

			is_liege_of = FROM
			FROM = { is_councillor = yes }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3152.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			NOT = { character = FROM }
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3176.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			NOT = { character = FROM }
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

	desc = emf_notify.3201.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3201.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3201.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			is_liege_of = FROM
			FROM = { is_councillor = yes }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3201.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			NOT = { character = FROM }
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3225.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			NOT = { character = FROM }
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3274.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3274.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			is_liege_of = FROM
			FROM = { is_councillor = yes }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3274.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			NOT = { character = FROM }
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}
